amendment.description: Amendment sought to apply the bill's investor testing requirements only to applicable disclosure documents developed after January 21, 2021.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 116-237 to apply the bills investor testing requirements only to applicable disclosure documents developed after January 21, 2021.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 230 (Roll no. 563).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Wagner.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole

House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Wagner amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 188 - 230 (Roll no. 563).
